case.title: Looking....SWM - 41 (Westchester )
case.text:
Hardworking, friendly, affectionate, 41 year old Latin bbw, hoping to find a friend...a companion to go out with occasionally, have fun...get to know each other and see where it may lead.
Looking for: SINGLE WHITE MALE who is caring, funny, honest, open minded....B/W 35-50.
I am not looking for a fwb/one night stand. I know - this is CL...but you never know! If you feel this is you, feel free to say hi, and we will go from there...... No nude pictures please!
